headline: Fiserv Turnaround Weighed By ServiceNow AI Push And Investor Lawsuits
summary: Fiserv (NasdaqGS:FISV) has expanded its partnership with ServiceNow to support AI driven transformation across financial services workflows. The company is facing fresh investor lawsuits alleging it misled shareholders by inflating growth figures and mishandling key technology bids. These developments arrive as new CEO Mike Lyons advances the "One Fiserv" plan to reshape the business and its technology stack. Fiserv enters this phase of change with its shares at $62.11 and a value score of...
